Desc.entry: Provides continuing respite and short term care for older adults with functional mental health needs with 29 beds. Day Care Service has 10 places a day, 4 days a week. Brooklees Day Hospital also on site. Owned and managed by Sheffield Health and Social Care Foundation Trust. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
